name: Deep Infiltration
description:
You are the leading reconnaissance agent for a large PMC (Private Military Company) company. You have been tasked with retrieving stolen intel from a massive mega corporation that specialises in AI and advanced security robotics. As you dive deeper into the company you discover technology on a scale you never thought possible.

Your only question right now is; will the stolen intel be all you learn from this place?

Or will it be something beyond your comprehension? How much knowledge will you gain and How many times will you have to infiltrate them?

Project Developed by Vedanth Panchoo and Tshietso Lindelani Mosheshe
